short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Additional information and tools for browsing results in the Serbian DNA Project database
short.sr: Додатне информације и алати за преглед резултата у табели СДНКП

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extensions provides additional information and tools for members of the Association of Serbian Genealogists "Poreklo", while browsing the resulits in the Serbian DNA Project's database:

1) Displaying haplogroup age and TMRCA (Time to Most Recent Common Ancestor) as tooltip, while hovering mouse over haplogrup's name, and providing direct hyperlink to YFull tree of that haplogroup
2) Genetic distance comparison - quickly discover genetic distance between selected individual and other tested people shown in the table
long.sr:
The extensions provides additional information and tools for members of the Association of Serbian Genealogists "Poreklo", while browsing the resulits in the Serbian DNA Project's database:

1) Different background color of STR values, indicating STR mutation rate
2) Displaying haplogroup age and TMRCA (Time to Most Recent Common Ancestor) as tooltip, while hovering mouse over haplogrup's name
3) Genetic distance comparison - quickly discover genetic distance between selected individual and other tested people shown in the table
